StructuredXMLResume.Objective:
To be an accomplished professional who strives for excellence at every step of life with a focus on innovation and value addition. Being a techie and also handling a team efficiently. My moto to work as a lead like help others to unblock their problem with an optimized and easy way. And also keep on working with code to as an individual contributor.
Higher Secondary	Uluberia high School	WBCHSE	2006   68.30
Madhyamik Pariksha	Uluberia high School	WBBSE	2004   80.01

PositionHistory.Description:
1. Apiture DevPortal Team Size 14
Details: Apiture Devportal is an open banking API project. Where developers can create their own SDK to set up any application to use OPEN banking APIs. It is complete banking domain solution. We are providing complete end to end solution for the OPEN API Solution for developers.
User can request for multiple level API key and access token for multiple environment. It is completely secured and highly scalable. Complete agile process maintained in 3 weeks sprint

Technologies used:- NodeJs 11.0.0, REST full web services, AngularJS 7, Jekyll template engine. Complete AWS services, cognito,DynamoDB, SSM, SNS, Route 53, Lambda.

My Role:- I am working as Enterprise Architect to work on the end to end solution DFD. And also the process I am handling from the scratch. I initially started this from scratch. Leading a team of 14 in-terms of technical guidance and also engaging myself to take care the delivery.

It is a higher version of stripe.com what we are building now. We have version specific API documentation.

URL:- production.developer.apiture.com

1. Individual Store View (ISV) , Team Size 10
Details: Individual Store View (ISV) provides an ability to view any Sears / Kmart store details related to their demographics, physical location, real estate information, competitors, financial performance, BU performance and member performance.
Technologies used:- node 6.5.4,REST  full web services angular 1.5.4, Google cloud big query, mongo db, solr DB agile process

1. Amazon Alexa ECHO integration With IBM Watson chatBOT, team size 2.
Details: Amazon echo device used with node to create a voice automated application for banking front desk as well as some specific department where customer care is integrated as BOT. We integrated IBM Watson chatBOT. Admin can train them as per requirement also.
Technologies Used: NodeJS, IBM Watson Service, Amazon Echo device, Angular2

1. IMV analytics web app for 153M active customers individual record and also we are working on the behaviour of individual customer and predict the future purchases of any individual customer. Team size 10 working as Technical Lead also IC.
Details: as its a analytics platform we are working with we need to handle huge amount of data like 1tb of data we need to process. So we are using Google cloud big query as a big data platform.
Technologies used:- node 6.5.4, angular 1.5.4, Google cloud big query, mongo db, solr DB

1. MDE is a analytics platform where we segregate 153M active customers by some predefined filters provided by business unit heads. Team size 10 working as Technical Lead also IC.
Details: as its a analytics platform we are working with we need to handle huge amount of data like 1tb of data we need to process. So we are using Google cloud big query as a big data platform.
Technologies used:- node 6.5.4, angular 1.5.4, Google cloud big query, mongo db, solr DB

1. CSquire Team Size 6. Mean Stack Developer
Details: CSQUIRE is a business-to-business networking site focused on creating a knowledge sharing community of business software users (ERP, Accounting, Marketing Automation etc.) and software professionals  consultants, consulting organizations and power users.
The CSQUIRE community is based on profiles of individuals who associate themselves with companies and products.
Technologies Used: NodeJS,Jade Template, JavaScript, Stripe Payment Gateway, MongoDB, BootStrap, Agile Development,Redis,Strompath

1. Ubee Chat Team Size 17 Team Lead
Node.Js, AngularJs,RethinkDB,Agile Development,MongoDB
Details:It's a chat application with some advanced options for users than whatsapp and hike. Multiple new options are there. We are using nodeJS with rethinkDB database in backend for the faster response from server to make the chat application faster. We made this as a chat module. We can call this chat functionality like plug and play. Also have the options to modify the theme and also the restrictions in the chat application

1. Cisco Collaborative Knowledge team size 6 Mean Stack Developer
Node.JS , elasticsearch,express, mongoDB,Agile Development, Kafka
Details:This is a tutorial application. Any user can enroll for a course can take a course can ask for a specialist instructor in this application. Have question answer section can clear any doubt in group or direct to sepecialist.We are using elasticsearch a primary DB and mongoDB as a backup DB. Used kafka and storm just not to lose any data if server is down.

Using loadbalancer to handle heavy request load.

Node.Js, AngularJs,RethinkDB,Agile Development,MongoDB

Enterprise Architect Handling FullStack Developement
            

Ranjoy Ghosh
Hyderabad	IT Ex.: 8 years

Full Stack Development Experience: 6 Years	AngularJS Ex.: 4 Years
Email: - ranjoy.ghosh88@gmail.com	Notice period 90 days
Skype:- ranjoy.ghosh88

sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:Description: Ranjoy Ghosh's experience appears to be strongly concentrated in Information Technology (mostly Big Data) and slightly concentrated in Finance (mostly Internal Audit). Ranjoy Ghosh has 9 years of work experience, with several years tenure in management, including a low-level position.
